summary: AN ORDINANCE repealing SMC 2.04.480 and reenacting SMC 2.04.350 through 2.04.370 and 2.04.400 through 2.04.480, to preserve campaign contribution limitations, and the campaign financing program, and amending SMC 2.04.420 to permit candidates in the matching fund program to donate up to $2,000 to their own campaigns.
